comment: Hey everybody. Been looking for an alternative to Zuckerberg's little anti-free-thought data mining operation. Thought I'd give Gab a try. So far looks good. Glad to be here,
amr:
# ::snt Hey everybody. Been looking for an alternative to Zuckerberg's little anti-free-thought data mining operation. Thought I'd give Gab a try. So far looks good. Glad to be here,
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h / hey)
            :ARG2 (e / everybody))
      :snt2 (l / look-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (a / alternative
                  :ARG1-of (ii3 / instead-of-91
                        :ARG2 (o / operate-01
                              :ARG0 (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Zimmerman"))
                              :ARG1 (m2 / mine-01
                                    :ARG1 (d / data)
                                    :ARG0-of (c / counter-01
                                          :ARG1 (f / free-04
                                                :ARG3 (t / think-01)))
                                    :mod (l2 / little)))))
            :snt3 t
            :ARG0 ii2
            :ARG1 (g / give-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (t2 / try-01
                        :ARG0 ii2)
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Gab"))))
      :snt4 (l3 / look-02
            :ARG1 (g2 / good-02)
            :time (s2 / so-far))
      :snt5 (g3 / glad-02
            :ARG0 (b / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 ii2
                  :ARG2 (h2 / here))))
